basics.name: Mathieu Perrais
basics.label: iOS developer
basics.summary: I spent the first half of my career advising businesses on their mobile development needs, gathering and defining requirements and delivering end-to-end iOS apps for a wide range of industries. The second half of my career has been focused on high quality projects in which I took the lead in framework, tooling and advanced UI development whilst keeping my team and I up to date with the best practices. Throughout my career I was able to innovate and share my deep interest in all specificities of app design.

work.summary: Worked on companion apps both on iOS and Android for a bluetooth connected vaping device
highlights: Developed a new iPhone companion app for JUUL Labs new connected product working with Bluetooth LE technology and driving most of the front-end and UI architectural decisions
Member of a large cross-functional team and work closely with designers, security experts and firmware engineers
Lead UI test automation efforts for the companion Android app & trained junior members of the QA team to tools and best practices

work.summary: Lead the development of an improved and redesigned version of a location-based social media app.
Maintained and improved the universal apps of the two leading brands of the YNAP group: NET-A-PORTER & MR PORTER
highlights: Led teams of junior and offshore developers assuring both quality of work and people’s development
Led several UX improvements around on boarding, product browsing, spotlight search and authentication

work.summary: As part of a global consulting and digital agency, I worked for several clients in the banking, insurance and retail industries
highlights: Developed iOS enterprise and store apps for global B2B and B2C companies in Swift and Objective-C
Ran workshops, defined requirements and stories, helped prioritizing and advised on release strategy and planning
Worked in teams both onshore and offshore and I led small (2 to 5 people) Scrum and Kanban teams through all build stages
Certified Scrum Product Owner – Scrum Alliance, April 2016

work.summary: Worked on projects for iOS, Android and Windows Phone as part of a mobile development agency
Worked in an innovative and multidisciplinary team specialized in new uses and natural user interface.
